info.title: OrangeHRM Open Source : REST API v2 docs
info.description:
This page contans documentation on how to use OrangeHRM via API calls.

 ## OrangeHRM Starter Application 

 ### Getting started
 * Download the latest version of OrangeHRM Starter [here](https://sourceforge.net/projects/orangehrm/files/latest/download) 

 # Authorization 

 Include authorization documentation here 

 # Technincal Overview 

 Include technical overview here

schema.description: Empty body as the language is enabled without any parameters
a valid group id of I18N-Language
a valid group id of I18N-Group

data.example: langStringId: 59, note: null, source: "Add Currency", target: "Valuta toevoegen"

data.description: Module name and the boolean value to denote if it is enabled
data.example: admin: true, pim: true, leave: false, time: true,...

data.example: admin: true, pim: true, leave: true, time: true,...

data.description: if request paraneter 'mode' is tree SubunitTreeModel is used

parentId.description: Should be the id of the parent node
